name: World Boxing Manager
description: World Boxing Manager is a game in which you develop and manage the careers of young, hungry boxers desperate for glory. You scout and recruit fighters from a pool of amateurs who come to train at your gym - it's up to you to decide who to mold into championship material.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7 Processor: Pentium II (or equivelant) 800mhz or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 display or greater Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
